DOC.brief_summary: The present study conduct meta-analysis 22 randomly control trial assess effect soluble fiber intake blood pressure human subject . Using Cochrane Handbook Systematic Reviews Intervention , systematic review meta-analysis conduct . Information regard study method , characteristic , mean BP standard deviation extract The data study pool use random effect model estimate effect soluble fiber consumption blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Soluble Fiber Blood Pressure : A Meta-analysis Randomly-controlled Trials
DOC.criteria: Randomized Controlled Trials Parallel Crossover Design Duration : > 3 week Human trial Viscous ( soluble ) fiber Viable endpoint data Articles publish English Nonhuman Nonrandomized Lack control Less 4 week duration No viable endpoint data
